item.description:
Lets finish the summer off right with a long weekend of hikes, bike rides,  BBQ and bonfires! Saturday and Sunday will each have 2 hiking options - Moderate and Advanced AND 1 mountain bike option.  Moderate hikes will be in the 4 to 5 mile range and the advanced will be around 9 miles.  

This will be a great intro-weekend to the Wedeln Ski & Outdoor Club.  If you have never been to our house then this is an ideal weekend to make your first visit. The Wedeln Ski House is located on the Bartlet / N. Conway NH townline, close to the Cranmore Ski Area.  The house is tucked away half way up Hurricane Mountain and has hiking and biking trails right out the back side of the house.  Accomadations are only $20 per night, bring your own bedding.

We are still working on the hike and entertainment schedule.  Possible hikes include:

Mt Kearsage

Black Cap to Peaked Mt (best 5 mile beginner hike in the NH, most of hike is downhill)

Mt. Washington

Mountain bike trails include the Red Tail trail which is a short ride from the house.

More details to come.  Due to the purchase of food we will require a $20 down payment for this weekend. 21+.  Please do not use GPS to find house, you will get lost.  Directions will be sent to all attendees.
item.how_to_find_us: Come up on friday night we will be at the house by 6pm
item.name: Labor Day Weekend - Hikes and Mountain Bikes
